title: The Godfather
casting: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Richard S. Castellano
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
casting: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
writers: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
casting: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
writers: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
description: When the menace known as The Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
casting: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Schindler's List
casting: Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes, Caroline Goodall
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
casting: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 12 Angry Men
casting: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam, John Fiedler
description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
casting: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Forrest Gump
casting: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Inception
casting: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Fight Club
casting: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
casting: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Stephen Sinclair (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Goodfellas
casting: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
writers: Nicholas Pileggi (book), Nicholas Pileggi (screenplay), Martin Scorsese (screenplay)
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: The Matrix
casting: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
casting: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
writers: Leigh Brackett (screenplay by), Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay by), George Lucas (story by)
description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

title: The Green Mile
casting: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: The Intouchables
casting: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
casting: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Saving Private Ryan
casting: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Pianist
casting: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: Gladiator
casting: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
writers: David Franzoni (story), David Franzoni (screenplay), John Logan (screenplay), William Nicholson (screenplay)
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Departed
casting: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
writers: William Monahan (screenplay), Alan Mak (2002 screenplay Mou gaan dou), Felix Chong (2002 screenplay Mou gaan dou)
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: The Prestige
casting: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine
writers: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Priest (novel)
description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Lion King
casting: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
writers: Irene Mecchi (screenplay by), Jonathan Roberts (screenplay by), Linda Woolverton (screenplay by), Burny Mattinson (story), Barry Johnson (story), Lorna Cook (story), Thom Enriquez (story), Andy Gaskill (story), Gary Trousdale (story), Jim Capobianco (story), Kevin Harkey (story), Jorgen Klubien (story), Chris Sanders (story), Tom Sito (story), Larry Leker (story), Joe Ranft (story), Rick Maki (story), Ed Gombert (story), Francis Glebas (story), Mark Kausler (story), J.T. Allen (additional story material), George Scribner (additional story material), Miguel Tejada-Flores (additional story material), Jenny Tripp (additional story material), Bob Tzudiker (additional story material), Christopher Vogler (additional story material), Kirk Wise (additional story material), Noni White (additional story material)
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: The Usual Suspects
casting: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin
description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

title: American History X
casting: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien
description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: The Shining
casting: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
writers: Stephen King (novel), Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Diane Johnson (screenplay)
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
casting: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: The Professional
casting: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello
description: A Los Angeles cartoonist becomes embedded in the murder and chaos of his profession.

title: City of God
casting: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele, Phellipe Haagensen
description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: The Lives of Others
casting: Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur
description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: The Sting
casting: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning
description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: Whiplash
casting: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist, Paul Reiser
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
